Sorry, I'm a compulsive arguer sometimes.  And from your last post it 
sure didn't LOOK like you agreed with me.

Yeesh, now I'm arguing about arguing.  Sorry, my bad, dropping it 
like a hot potato ... yadda yadda yadda.
